docs.lead_paragraph: School kids are giving thanks to first lady Michelle Obama just in time for the holiday — with a sarcastic Twitter hashtag about unappealing school lunches.

headline.print_headline: Kids Give First Lady Sarcastic 'Thanks' on Twitter

headline.main: White House Taps First Female Pastry Chef

docs.abstract: The White House has shattered a glass ceiling — in its kitchen.
docs.snippet: The White House has shattered a glass ceiling — in its kitchen.

docs.lead_paragraph: The federal government has threatened to cut funding for Maine’s food stamp program, saying the state may be violating recipients' civil rights by requiring welfare cards to bear their photograph.

headline.main: U.S. Threatens to Cut Food Stamp Funding to Maine in Photo ID Row
headline.print_headline: U.S. Threatens to Cut Food Stamp Funding to Maine in Photo ID Row

docs.snippet: The federal government has threatened to cut funding for Maine’s food stamp program, saying the state may be violating recipients' civil rights by requiring welfare cards to bear their photograph.

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Paul LePage's administration is facing a potential loss of federal funding to administer its food stamp program over concerns about the state's decision to put photos on cards used to access the benefits.

headline.main: Maine Risks Losing Funding Over Food Stamp Policy
headline.print_headline: Maine Risks Losing Funding Over Food Stamp Policy

docs.snippet: Gov. Paul LePage's administration is facing a potential loss of federal funding to administer its food stamp program over concerns about the state's decision to put photos on cards used to access the benefits.

docs.lead_paragraph: Boxing is a hurt business, as Manny Pacquiao found out when he ended up face down on the canvas after being knocked out just three fights ago by Juan Manuel Marquez.

docs.lead_paragraph: Most college graduates earn enough to repay their student loans. The bigger problem is that they’re asked to do so when they are earning the least.

headline.main: Student Debt: A Calculator Focused on College Majors

headline.main: When Activist Investors Aim at Strong Companies

docs.abstract: In the Another View column, Bill George examines four situations — Amgen, PepsiCo, DuPont, and Allergan — to see where activist investors have it wrong.

docs.lead_paragraph: Snowed out in Buffalo, the Bills are heading to Detroit to play their "home" game against the New York Jets on Monday night.

docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis condemned speculation in food commodities and greed for profits on Thursday, saying they were undermining the global fight against poverty and hunger.

headline.main: Pope Says Food Commodity Speculation Hurts Fight Against Hunger
headline.print_headline: Pope Says Food Commodity Speculation Hurts Fight Against Hunger

docs.snippet: Pope Francis condemned speculation in food commodities and greed for profits on Thursday, saying they were undermining the global fight against poverty and hunger.

docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis demanded a more just distribution of the world's bounty for the poor and hungry Thursday, telling a U.N. conference on nutrition that access to food is a basic human right that shouldn't be subject to market speculation and quests for profit.

headline.main: Pope Demands Just Distribution of World's Bounty
headline.print_headline: Pope Demands Just Distribution of World's Bounty
